ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 368
ygData.msgSnippet: I once saw a posting regarding recipe for gun and bullets in the game.  Is it true or someone just having fun with fake posting somewhere? ... The MOB and
ygData.messageBody:
I once saw a posting regarding recipe for gun and bullets in the game. Is it true or someone just having fun with fake posting somewhere?

On Tue, 19 June 2001, EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>
> There is 1 message in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Re: Digest Number 366
> From: Madgrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Mon, 18 Jun 2001 09:13:09 -0400
> From: Madgrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 366
>
> Someone said that in beta it was used to cut the gem out of a jeweler made
> item in order for the jeweler to be able to attempt again without having to
> buy another gem. I don't have a gemcutter, but I would suspect either 1)
> putting the gemcutter in a jeweler's bag with a jeweler made item and
> combining or 2) putting the gemcutter in a tinkerer's toolbox with a
> jeweler made item and combining would either 1) produce a gem, or 2) will
> not combine. Worth a shot.. wish I had one.
>
> Atinky
>
> At 02:02 AM 6/16/2001 -0400, you wrote:
> > I think Yak stated a couple months back that the Gemcutter was
> >originally intended to be used in a Paladin quest, but that the quest was
> >never added. Hence, it is a useless, though quite profitable, item.
> >
> >Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (TT)
>
>
